title: The Study of Toni Morrison's song of Solomon as a means to awaken the African-Americans from The American dream of materialism and the value of The African heritage for The African-Americans' live
abstract: This thesis is a study of Song of Solomon and the value of the African heritage for the African-Americans'life as reflected in Toni Morrison's Song of Solomon.This novel is used to awaken the African-Americans from materialism.The writer of this thesis is interested in analyzing how Toni Morrison uses Song of Solomon to awaken the African-Ameri - cans from American Dream of materialism.The literary approach that the writer uses to answer the problem as stated in the statement of the problem are characterization and conflict.She is going to analyze Macon Dead,Pilate,Milkman and Milkman's inner conflict in order to prove that Morrison uses Song of Solomon to awaken the African-Americans from the American dream of material - ism.Through this analysis,the readers can understand more about the relationship of the American Dream of materialism and the African heritage which is the oral tradition and realize that happiness is not always gained by having much money and/or being successful.
subjects: AMERICAN FICTION-20TH CENTURY-STUDY AND TEACHING; MORRISON, TONI, 1931-.... SONG OF SOLOMON-STUDY AND TEACHING
